showInputMenu.title: Show Input Menu
showInputMenu.description: Show input menu in login window.

LoginwindowText.title: Banner
LoginwindowText.description: Enter a message that's displayed above the login prompt. You might use this to provide a warning about unauthorized use.

LogOutDisabledWhileLoggedIn.title: Log Out Menu Item Disabled
LogOutDisabledWhileLoggedIn.description: Hide the Log Out menu item.

ShutDownDisabledWhileLoggedIn.title: Shut Down Menu Item Disabled
ShutDownDisabledWhileLoggedIn.description: Hide the Shut Down menu item.

PowerOffDisabledWhileLoggedIn.title: Power Off Menu Item Disabled
PowerOffDisabledWhileLoggedIn.description: Hide the Power Off menu item.

HideAdminUsers.title: Hide Admin Users
HideAdminUsers.description: If true, hides administrator users when showing a user list.

IncludeNetworkUser.title: Show Network Users
IncludeNetworkUser.description: If true, shows network users when showing a user list.

SHOWOTHERUSERS_MANAGED.title: Display Other...
SHOWOTHERUSERS_MANAGED.description: If true, displays Other... when showing a list of users.

SHOWFULLNAME.title: Login Window Behavior
SHOWFULLNAME.description: If true, shows the name and password dialog; if false, displays a list of users.

HideMobileAccounts.title: Hide Mobile Accounts
HideMobileAccounts.description: If true, hides mobile account users in a user list. In some cases, mobile users show up as network users.

AdminHostInfo.title: Show additional information in the menu bar
AdminHostInfo.description: Cycle through the hostname, macOS version, and IP address when the menu bar is clicked.

HideLocalUsers.title: Hide Local Users
HideLocalUsers.description: If true, shows only network and system users when showing a user list.
